titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Robert Dick Journeyman dues booklet 1988.062
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:10:11 +0000.

did.abstract: This is a Journeyman dues booklet for machinist Robert Dick. The booklet was issued by the International Association of Machinists National Lodge 556 located on Parkside Avenue in Brooklyn. The booklet is dated 1951.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Robert Dick Journeyman dues booklet, 1988.062, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1988.
